-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]


exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
fieldterminator='','',
ROWTERMINATOR=''\n''
    ) AS [result]'

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]



SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON;


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(20))
    AS [result]

select * from sys.databases--collation_name=SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(20))
    AS [result]


    create database nyc_taxi_zone
    use nyc_taxi_zone

    alter DATABASE nyc_taxi_zone collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8


    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(20))
    AS [result]





SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
--HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
--fieldterminator=',',
--ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        LocationID SMALLINT 1,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3 ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4)
    AS [result]









 SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (locationid SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4)
    AS [result]





SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=false,
FIRSTROW=2,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (locationid SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4)
    AS [result]






drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw with (
    location ='https://synapsecourse123678dl.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/'
)



SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_source= 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
HEADER_ROW=false,
FIRSTROW=2,
fieldterminator=',',
ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with (locationid SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(20) 4)
    AS [result]
